Knot tying Students should be able to tie the following knots in an application similar to those listed: Bowline (attach a line to an anchor) Cleat hitch (cleat off a boatâ€™s dock line) Clove hitch (secure a line to a piling) Half hitch (add extra security to another knot) Figure eight knot (stop a line from passing through a concrete anchor hole) Lobster buoy hitch (secure a line to a buoy) See instructional videos below.
